original_title: Govt.’s new tourism strategy to attract 5 mn tourists: RW
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka is planning to attract 5 million tourists, including 2.5 million high-end visitors, contributing to the country's economic growth, President Ranil Wickremesinghe said today.

The President said this while addressing the 'Bocuse d'Or 2023' competition and awards ceremony where he announced the government's new tourism strategy, 'Visit Sri Lanka’ which is set to launch in the upcoming months, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
